intro: Schizolaena elongata, commonly known as the elongated schizolaena, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its slender, often climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow, with five petals and a prominent tubular corolla. Schizolaena elongata is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
